<script src="https://d3js.org/d3.v7.min.js"></script>

<script>
// D3.js Network Graph Animation
const width = window.innerWidth;
const height = window.innerHeight;

// Create SVG container
const svg = d3.select("#networkCanvas")
  .attr("width", width)
  .attr("height", height);

// Generate nodes
const nodeCount = 50;
const nodes = d3.range(nodeCount).map(() => ({
  x: Math.random() * width,
  y: Math.random() * height,
  vx: (Math.random() - 0.5) * 0.5,
  vy: (Math.random() - 0.5) * 0.5
}));

// Create links between nearby nodes
function getLinks() {
  const links = [];
  const maxDistance = 150;
  
  for (let i = 0; i < nodes.length; i++) {
    for (let j = i + 1; j < nodes.length; j++) {
      const dx = nodes[i].x - nodes[j].x;
      const dy = nodes[i].y - nodes[j].y;
      const distance = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
      
      if (distance < maxDistance) {
        links.push({
          source: nodes[i],
          target: nodes[j],
          distance: distance,
          opacity: 0.2 * (1 - distance / maxDistance)
        });
      }
    }
  }
  return links;
}

// Create link elements
const linkGroup = svg.append("g").attr("class", "links");
const nodeGroup = svg.append("g").attr("class", "nodes");

// Create node circles
const nodeElements = nodeGroup.selectAll("circle")
  .data(nodes)
  .join("circle")
  .attr("r", 4)
  .attr("fill", "rgba(235, 213, 178, 0.5)");

// Animation function
function animate() {
  // Update node positions
  nodes.forEach(node => {
    node.x += node.vx;
    node.y += node.vy;
    
    // Bounce off edges
    if (node.x < 0 || node.x > width) node.vx *= -1;
    if (node.y < 0 || node.y > height) node.vy *= -1;
  });
  
  // Update links based on current positions
  const links = getLinks();
  
  // Update link elements
  linkGroup.selectAll("line")
    .data(links)
    .join("line")
    .attr("x1", d => d.source.x)
    .attr("y1", d => d.source.y)
    .attr("x2", d => d.target.x)
    .attr("y2", d => d.target.y)
    .attr("stroke", "rgba(235, 213, 178, 1)")
    .attr("stroke-opacity", d => d.opacity)
    .attr("stroke-width", 1);
  
  // Update node positions
  nodeElements
    .attr("cx", d => d.x)
    .attr("cy", d => d.y);
  
  requestAnimationFrame(animate);
}

// Handle window resize
window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
  const newWidth = window.innerWidth;
  const newHeight = window.innerHeight;
  svg.attr("width", newWidth).attr("height", newHeight);
});

// Start animation
animate();
</script>
